thread.title: Speeding Comet wins Belmont Park feature
thread.title_full: Speeding Comet wins Belmont Park feature

author: wtopstaff
title: Speeding Comet wins Belmont Park feature
text:
Home » News » Sports » Speeding Comet wins Belmont… Speeding Comet wins Belmont Park feature By The Associated Press October 11, 2015 5:31 pm 
NEW YORK (AP) — Speeding Comet streaked past Indian Brut to win the $77,000 allowance feature on the turf Sunday at Belmont Park. 
A 4-year-old trained by John Toscano, Speeding Comet surged in deep stretch for a one-length victory, his fourth in 13 starts. 
Irad Ortiz, Jr. was aboard for the seven furlongs in 1:22.80 on the firm course. 
Speeding Comet paid $9, $4.10 and $2.90. 
Indian Brut returned $7.80 and $5.90 while No Wunder paid $10 to show. Topics:
